content: moss stitch ear warmer by haley handcrafted materials -1 s kein w orsted w eight 4 y arn b ig t wist c lassic black a nd w hite approx 9 0 y ds -size 5 5mm c rochet h ook o r h ook t o o btain g auge -tapestry n eedle -scissors gauge and measurements gauge 17 single_crochet and chain sts x 14 row = 4 square the finished piece measures 8 5 wide x 5 tall when sewn together gauge is only important for this project if you want to make the wall hanging to these measurements abbreviations chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st s stitch es notes 1 to create the moss stitch single_crochet sts are worked into the chain 1 spaces of the previous row moss stitch ear warmer pattern chain 22 row 1 single_crochet into 4th chain from hook *chain 1 skip next chain single_crochet repeat from * to end of row turn 10 single_crochet chain 1 sts row 2-68 chain 3 single_crochet in first chain 1 space *chain 1 single_crochet in next chain 1 space repeat from * to end of row turn tie off leaving a long tail for sewing the front together fold both ends in half place the two ends together one half on top of the other sew together the two ends flip the piece right side out and there you have it enjoy your ear warmer this pattern and images are property of haley herman and haleyhandcrafted please do not reproduce copy or share any part of this pattern you may sell items created using this pattern but must give credit to haleyhandcrafted if you have any questions regarding this pattern please contact me at haleyhandcrafted@gmail com don t forget to follow haleyhancrafted on instagram and tag me in any projects you make i would love to see and share what you make
